# Simulation of engine control system performance

After 15 seconds of open loop response from the VIGV control system, the closed loop response takes over and results in the VIGV closing (Fig. 20.12) to maintain the EGT on the set point for the VIGV control system, which now corresponds to the maximum EGT limit. This results in the VIGV closing from 100% (open loop output) to about 70% (closed loop output) and the increase in the EGT during the closed loop response is shown in Fig. 20.13. After 15 seconds of open loop response from the VIGV control system, the closed loop response takes over and results in the VIGV closing (Fig. 20.12) to maintain the EGT on the set point for the VIGV control system, which now corresponds to the maximum EGT limit. This results in the VIGV closing from 100% (open loop output) to about 70% (closed loop output) and the increase in the EGT during the closed loop response is shown in Fig. 20.13.
